data.title: How to Implement Resampling Methods From Scratch In Python
data.description: The goal of predictive modeling is to create models that make good predictions on new data. We don’t have access to this new data at the time of training, so we must use statistical methods to estimate the performance of a model on new data. This class of methods are called resampling methods, as they […]

on machine learning. The goal was to accelerate AI research by bringing a

data.description: Keras is a high level library used to build neural network models. This tutorial focuses on its application and ways to solve problems with neural networks.

data.title: Differentiable neural computers
data.description: In a recent study in Nature, we introduce a form of memory-augmented neural network called a differentiable neural computer, and show that it can learn to use its memory to answer questions about complex, structured data, including artificially generated stories, family trees, and even a map of the London Underground. We also show that it can solve a block puzzle game using reinforcement learning.

data.title: How to Load Machine Learning Data From Scratch In Python

In this tutorial you will discover how to load your data in Python from […]
